description: Learn how to make pad thai from scratch. It's easier than you think and is sure to impress.
name: Easy Pad Thai Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add noodles, chicken and sauce to wok and stir-fry for 2 minutes or until heated through. Add coriander, tossing to combine. Divide among bowls, then scatter over peanuts, and extra coriander and chilli. Serve with extra lime wedges.
